alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson, northeastern Madison, southern Cook, southeastern Berrien, northwestern Lanier, Lowndes, Thomas, Brooks and southeastern Colquitt Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms centered 8 miles south of Quitman, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Valdosta, Thomasville, Quitman, Lake Park, Hahira, Boston, Ray City, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Meigs, Dasher, Morven, Berlin, Barwick, Cecil and Barretts. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
